tuv.seg: Exceptional Needs Payments are paid under the Supplementary Welfare Allowance Scheme
Is íocaíochtaí iad Íocaíocht ar Riachtanais Eisceachtúil agus Íocaíocht ar Riachtanais Phráinneach faoin scéim Liúntas Leasa Forlíontach
An Exceptional Needs Payment is a single payment to help meet essential, once-off, exceptional expenditure, which a person could not reasonably be expected to meet out of their weekly income
Is íocaíocht shingil í Íocaíocht ar Riachtanais Eisceachtúil chun cabhrú le caiteachas riachtanach aon uair ar chúinsí faoi leith, nach bhféadfaidh duine a ghlanadh ón ioncam seachtainiúil

For example, the payments can be for special clothing for a person who has a serious illness, bedding or cooking utensils for someone setting up a home for the first time, visiting relatives in hospital or prison, or funeral costs

Mar shampla, d’fhéadfaí íocaíochtaí a dhéanamh le haghaidh éadaí speisialta do dhuine ar a mbeadh galar trom, nó le haghaidh leapacha nó gréithe cócaireachta do dhuine atá ag dul i mbun a thí féin den chéad uair, ag tabhairt cuairte ar ghaolta atá san ospidéal nó i bpríosún, nó le haghaidh costas sochraide
You can also apply for financial help for clothing for children
Ní íoctar Riachtanais Eisceachtúla Íocaíochtaí a thuilleadh le haghaidh searmanais creidimh, go formhór comaoineacha agus cóineartaithe
Exceptional Needs Payments are no longer paid for religious ceremonies, mainly communions and confirmations
Is féidir lean ar iarratais chun cabhair airgeadais le haghaidh éadaí do leanaí a fháil
Help with funeral costs
Cúnamh le costaisí sochraide
You may be eligible for an Exceptional Needs Payment to help you with the cost of a funeral if your income is low
D'fhéadfá a bheith i dteideal Íocaíocht ar Riachtanais Eisceachtúil chun cabhrú leat le costaisí na sochraide má tá tú ar mhaoin íseal
Each case is decided on its merits by the Department of Social Protection's representative (formerly known as the Community Welfare Officer) at your local office

Déantar cinneadh ar gach cás ag brath ar na cúinsí ar leith a bhaineann leis, agus is é/í an Roinn Coimirce Sóisialaí ionadaí (tugadh an tOifigeach Leasa Pobail orthu roimhe seo) ag do ionad sláinte áitiúil a dhéanann an cinneadh
Help with fuel bills
Cúnamh le billí breosla
You may get help with the cost of your electricity or natural gas bill but only in exceptional circumstances
Déanfaidhan an Roinn Coimirce Sóisialaí ionadaí cinneadh ar do chás trí úsáid a bhaint as an gCód Cleachtais ar Fhiacha Breosla
What should I do if I have difficulties paying my energy bills?
Íocaíochtaí ar Riachtanais Phráinneach
The Department of Social Protection has published information to help you if you are in financial difficulty with your energy bills
D'fhéadfaí Íocaíocht ar Riachtanais Phráinneach a bheith íoctha le daoine i gcásanna éigeandála
You may be eligible for an Exceptional Needs Payment if:
Íocaíocht ar Riachtanais Eisceachtúil
• You are living in the State
• Tá tú i do chónaí sa stáit
• You satisfy a means test
• Éiríonn leat i scrúdú maoine
You won't normally be eligible if you are:
Go hiondúil ní bheith tú ina theideal má tá tú:
• In full-time work (more than 30 hours a week)
• Ag obair go lán-aimsearthach (níos mó ná 30 uair sa tseachtain)
• Involved in a trade dispute or on strike
• A glacadh páirt in aighneas trádála
However, you may apply for an Exceptional Needs Payment for your dependent adult or dependent child
Is féidir leat, áfach, iarratas a chur isteach ar Liúntas Leasa Forlíontach ar son do chleithiúnaigh
The amount of payment you get will depend on a means test and the type of assistance you need
Tá an méid cabhrach a bhfaighfidh tú le costaisí sochraide ag brath ar scrúdú maoine
You should apply for funeral assistance before the funeral takes place, however, failing this, you should apply as soon as possible afterwards
Moltar go ndéanfá iarratas ar chabhair sochraide roimh an sochraid, ach muna néiríonn leat é seo a dhéanamh, ba cheart duit an tiarratas a dhéanamh chomh luath agus is féidir leat taréis na sochraide
To apply for an Exceptional Needs Payment payment you will need:
Chun cur isteach ar íocaíocht géarghá beidh gá agat le:
• Personal Public Service (PPS) numbers for yourself, your spouse, civil partner or cohabitant and your children
• Uimhir Pearsanta Seirbhís Poiblí (PSP) duit féin, do chéile/páirtnéir sibhialta/comhchónaitheoir agus do pháistí
• Evidence of any income or social welfare assistance you are getting
• Cruthúnas de aon ioncam nó cúnamh leasa shóisialaigh atá tú ag fáil
You cannot appeal a decision on an Exceptional Needs Payment to the Social Welfare Appeals Office
Níl aon chóras ann le hachomharc Íocaíocht ar Riachtanais Eisceachtúil nó Íocaíocht ar Riachtanais Phráinneach a dhéanamh chuig an Oifig Achomharc Leasa Shóisialaigh
However, you may request that a decision be reviewed by the SWA Review Officer for the office which made the original decision
Ach is féidir leat iarraidh go ndéanfaidh an tOifigeach Breithiúnachta LLF, a bhaineann leis an oifig a rinne an bunchinneadh, athbhreithniú an cinneadh
You should contact the Department of Social Protection's representative (formerly known as the Community Welfare Officer) at your local office
Ba cheart duit teagmháil a dhéanamh le hionadaí na Roinne Coimirce Sóisialaí (tugadh an tOifigeach Leasa Pobail orthu roimhe seo) ag d'oifig sláinte áitiúil
